page.title: 07Beecraigs Country Park
page.content: Beecraigs Country Park which is owned by West Lothian District Council covers 880 acres of countryside near Torphichen. It has facilities for various activities such as archery, climbing and canoeing. Instructors are also available for groups who come up to try these out. The ranger service there organizes nature walks on a variety of subjects _ fungi, plants or animals. The park is open to the public, both local and visitor, and has miles of walkways. It also contains both a trout and deer farm. For those who have a taste for good living trout and venison are sold in a shop at the trout farm. It is possible to catch fish for yourself in the loch with permits available from West Lothian District Council. An excellent place to spend some leisure time.
